title: Game-Based Learning Design for Nursing Simulation

context.prior_knowledge: Basic nursing theory and clinical practice experience
context.additional_context: Work-integrated educational design for office/administrative professionals

learning_goals: Learners can perform patient status assessment and emergency care procedures with 80% accuracy in a VR simulation environment.
Through in-game decision-making systems, learners achieve a score of 2.5 or higher on a 3-level evaluation scale for clinical judgment in nursing scenarios.
Learners can design collaborative nursing processes and submit project deliverables through team-based game missions.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
